channel.title: My server will not work at all
channel.description: alright i use to have a server that i could get on with its ip and i could get on but no one else could, well my computer got nuked and i have started back making the server and now ive did everything but i can only connect using 127.0.0.1 as my ip, but is hould be able to use my no ip name. yes i have a source running and no-ip and the box is checked its jsut i cant connect without using 127.0.0.1 and no one else can help.

item.title: My server will not work at all
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

You’re going to need to port forward, which this may help you. Next time please read the rules though, as we aren’t here for computer related problems.

Read full topic
